entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 25 in a few localities.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:51 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
